title: iMonstickers
subtitle: Spooky-cute monster stickers
description:
iMonstickers is a collection of 16 playful stickers made for Messages, featuring little vampires, ghosts, zombies, wizards, and other classic monsters. Each character is full of personality and ready to help you express emotions like surprise, love, fear, excitement, or a simple "OK!"

Works in Messages on iPhone and iPad.
nameOrigin: These adorable monsters were designed by the brilliant illustrator Raúl Gil (https://raul-gil.com).
imageDescription: iMonstickers app icon - a cute monster character

features.title: 16 Unique Characters
features.description: A collection of cute and funny monster stickers, including vampires, ghosts, zombies, wizards, and more classic creatures.
features.imageDescription: The Messages app sticker drawer on iPhone, with iMonstickers selected. Three stickers are visible in the conversation: Frankenstein holding a heart, a smiling jack-o'-lantern, and a zombie giving a thumbs-up.

features.title: Full of Personality
features.description: Each monster is designed with character and emotion, perfect for expressing surprise, love, fear, excitement, or just saying "OK!"
features.imageDescription: A grid of six expressive monster characters: a shy werewolf apologizing, a wizard holding a magical hat with a snake, a smiling Grim Reaper with a scythe and hourglass, a nervous one-eyed cyclops, an angry pharaoh mummy crossing his arms, and the Invisible Man waving goodbye with his hat.

features.title: Works in Messages
features.description: Seamlessly integrated with the Messages app on iPhone and iPad. Peel and place them anywhere in your conversations.
features.imageDescription: Six colorful Halloween monster characters shown in a grid: a sad green blob, a cheerful vampire raising a toast, a worried purple demon, a masked slasher waving a knife, a smiling clown holding a present, and a panicked vampire whose head is slipping down.

whySection: iMonstickers brings a playful, spooky-cute twist to your Messages conversations. Designed by professional illustrator Raúl Gil, each sticker is crafted with care and personality. Perfect for Halloween or anytime you want to add some monstrous fun to your chats!
supportText: Have questions about iMonstickers or need help with the sticker pack? We're here to help!
